screen_desc: The screenshot displays a shopping cart page on a mobile device. The cart contains an additional Office app subscription and a Zenbook Flip 2-in-1 laptop with the total price of $1,265.99. There is an option to either pick up the items at a store or have them shipped, with Free Shipping available for a limited time. The page also shows a Best Buy Totaltech offer and a notification about an item being removed from the cart.
action_think: I've removed the last item from the cart. The user needs to clear all items from the cart.
action_plan: Continue to clear all items from the cart
Notify the user that all items have been cleared from the cart
action_desc: Clear all items from the cart
action_result: You have successfully scrolled up on the screen. This action will help you navigate to the bottom of the page where you can find the 'Remove' button for each item in the cart. After clicking 'Remove', the item will be cleared from the cart. This step is part of the process to clear all items from the cart, which is your user request.
